snippet.title: 3D Combat Zone - ZX Spectrum [Longplay]
snippet.description:
What do you think of 3D Combat Zone?
This is a longplay of the ZX Spectrum version which was released in 1983.
The video will show a full walkthrough and display the gameplay.

Did you play this game or have any opinion on what you can see?
Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

Completion Criteria: Play a game

Developed by: Jon Ritman
Published by: Artic Computing
Played by: Gremolin
